I have played the different version of this game ever since it was a MOD to the half-life game back in the early 2000's. I even payed for it before it was free and it is the game I have played more than any other. I enjoy the newest version as much as the old and have recently go into playing  'danger zone'. I think it is a really good addition to this game. My only problem is the amount of cheaters that are on here, it really spoils what otherwise is a brilliant game. It has got to the stage now that the game is almost unplayable, I would say that nearly half the games I play has someone cheating in it. Reporting them seems to do nothing at all. So unfortunately I am going to have to give this game a thumb down on this game until Valve manage to eradicate this problem.
